dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so get this, right? Like, a road in Uralsk, it's totally flooded with meltwater, connecting two neighborhoods. Can you even believe that?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A road in Uralsk has been flooded with meltwater. According to the Department of Emergency Situations of the West Kazakhstan region, due to heavy snowmelt, meltwater overflowed a low-lying section of an intra-city road in the Saryarka district of Uralsk, connecting two neighborhoods.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Exactly! Like, I saw that headline and I was just like, wait, what?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Prime Minister Olzhas Bektenov held a meeting of the national headquarters for flood prevention, instructing regional administrations to take all necessary measures to prevent flooding in residential areas.
